resources.string: The Music app lets you pull Songs, Albums and Artists from the internet
This Activity shows all the Artists
This Activity shows details of the selected artist
"How do we get the text/id of the artist that was clicked from the previous activity? Once we figure out, how do we get details of the artist over the internet?"
How to pull a set of albums dynamically from the internet?
This Activity shows details of the selected album
"How do we get the text/id of the album that was clicked from the previous activity? Once we figure out, how do we get details of the album over the internet?"
How to pull a set of songs dynamically from the internet? Click song to play it
This Activity shows details of the selected song
How do we get the text/id of the song that was clicked from the previous activity? Once we figure out, how do we add controls to play, pause, rewind the song?
